title: Cheats chicken and veg pies
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons sunflower oil (separated)', '4 shallots, halved', '3 small carrots,sliced', '2 chicken breast fillets, chopped into small pieces', '2 tablespoons chicken gravy granules', '250ml (1/2 pint) chicken stock, made with a stock cube', '1 small packet puff pastry', '50g drained tinned garden peas', 'salt to taste']
